story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful island of Sri Lanka, there lived a little elephant named Rani. Rani was a special elephant because she had a magical ability - she could make the stars twinkle brighter in the night sky.

Every evening, as the sun dipped below the horizon, Rani would walk to the top of the highest hill in the jungle. There, she would raise her trunk towards the heavens and let out a gentle trumpet. And just like that, the stars would start to glimmer and dance, creating a magnificent light show that could be seen from miles around.

Children from all over the island would gather in the evenings to watch Rani's magical display. They would listen in awe as the elders told tales of the brave and kind-hearted elephant who lit up the night sky with her special gift.

One night, as Rani was preparing for her nightly routine, she noticed that one of the stars looked dim and sad. Worried, Rani decided to embark on a journey to the farthest reaches of the jungle to find out what was wrong.

After a long and adventurous journey, Rani discovered that the sad star was actually a lost firefly who had lost her way home. The firefly had been wandering in the darkness, unable to find her light to guide her way.

Rani, with her kind heart, offered to help the firefly find her light again. Together, they embarked on a journey back to the hill where Rani usually performed her magic. And with a little bit of encouragement and guidance from Rani, the firefly found her light again, twinkling brightly in the night sky.

From that night on, Rani and the firefly became the best of friends. They would light up the night sky together, bringing joy and wonder to all who watched their magical display.

And so, every evening, as children drifted off to sleep under the twinkling stars, they would remember the story of Rani the elephant and the lost firefly, and how friendship and kindness can light up even the darkest of nights.

And with that heartwarming tale, the children of Sri Lanka drifted into a peaceful sleep, dreaming of the magical adventures that awaited them in the starlit sky.
